reqs: In 2017W, the topic for HIST 403E, section 101 is Falling Apart: American Power in a Failing Global Order, 1919 to 1939. Explores American perspectives on the unravelling world order 1919-1939 and what they tell us about the political imagination and possibilities of the time.
courseName: Seminar in the History of International Relations - INTRNATNL RELTNS
description: Selected topics in the history of international relations. Priority for registration will be given to fourth-year majors in the International Relations and History programs.
